name: Cosmic Respite
description:
After a terrible crash, you must recover the lost parts of your spaceship to get back into space.

Explore this small world and blast all boulders in your way!

Controls:

  • WASD = move
  • Space = jump
  • Mouse = look around
  • Left Click = fire laser beam
  • Escape = pause
  • H = hide hud

Made by Ian in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38.

Tools Used:

  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Paint.net
  • Bfxr
  • Jukedeck
  • Audacity
  • Spacescape
  • Visual Studio Code
